name: RUN CHLEBYCH RUN !!!
description:
THE NEW VERSION 1.0 WILL BE RELEASED VERY SOON

CONTROLS:

leftarrow-left

rightarrow-right

shift-jump

whitespace-shoot

whitespace+shift-shoot down

`-full screen mode

esc-windowed mode

STORY:

Сhlebych is a toast who takes revenge for his relatives. Fruit and toast lived inharmony, but suddenly the fruit decided to attack the toast. As a result, all the toasts died in battles, but it turned out that one warrior-Сhlebych survived. He decided to take revenge on his enemies and abusers at all costs.
